typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dfparam as string
}
source(output(
		id as string,
		action as string,
		criteria as string,
		device as string,
		gender as string,
		ageGroup as string,
		transactionTimeOfDay as string,
		metricsTimeOfDay as string,
		isReturnedPatient as string,
		createdDateTime as string,
		transactionDate as string,
		previousMetricsDate as string,
		metricsDate as string,
		location as string,
		userGroup as string,
		specialty as string,
		transactionStatus as string,
		paymentMethod as string,
		totalAmount as string,
		count as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive({Package name} = "email",
		{Package Execution Time} = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
